spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: Fala is a 4th-level spellcaster. Their spellcasting ability is Wisdom. They have the following druid spells prepared:

trait.name: Fey Ancestry
entries: Fala has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition charmed}, and magic can't put them to sleep.

action.name: Quarterstaff
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 2} to hit or Melee Weapon Attack {@hit 4} to hit with shillelagh, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}3 ({@damage 1d6}) bludgeoning damage, or 6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) bludgeoning damage with shillelagh or if wielded with two hands.
